taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Caryophyllaceae;subfamily Caryophylloideae;genus Silene;species conica;subspecies conica;

bio:treatment.discussion: Subspecies conica, a rare adventive weed, is very similar to Silene conoidea, from which it can be separated, with difficulty, by the smaller size of most of its parts. It is also similar to S. coniflora, which has a calyx with fewer veins and shorter teeth.
